title: How do I sign up for PBE?
body: Riot never tells us... where is the PBE link?

replies.body: You can sign up for the PBE servers right here on our [**PBE sign up page**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup)! At the moment, PBE sign ups are closed for maintenance, but be sure to check back soon so you can apply!
